products.name: deploy-arch-ibm-account-infra-base
products.label: Account Infrastructure Base
products.short_description: Creates and configures the base layer components of an IBM Cloud account
products.long_description: This architecture supports creating and configuring the base layer components of an IBM Cloud account, including IAM account settings, Activity Tracker routing, Cloud Objects Storage, Trusted profile and associated access groups and the resource group in which all resources will be provisioned in.

features.title: Configure IAM account settings
features.description: Configure IAM account settings so they meet FSCloud compliance requirements.

features.title: Creates Activity Tracker route and target
features.description: Creates Activity Tracker route and target so events are sent to a COS bucket.

features.title: Creates Trusted profile
features.description: Creates Trusted profile and associated access group for Projects.

features.title: Creates resource group
features.description: Creates resource group where all resources created by this solution are provisioned.

profiles.profile_name: IBM Cloud Framework for Financial Services

architecture.descriptions: This architecture supports creating and configuring the base layer components of an IBM Cloud account.
